meanings.sent1: Visiting the ancient thermes gave us a glimpse into the bathing practices of the past civilizations.
meanings.sent2: The intricate mosaics adorning the walls of the thermes depicted scenes from mythology.

meanings.sent4: The grandeur of the marble columns in the thermes transported us back to the glory days of the Roman Empire.
meanings.sent5: The echoes of chatter and splashing water filled the air inside the bustling thermes.
